## Resources for R

## Advice on trouble shooting

- You will learn a lot more if you Google your problems.
- Use [StackOverflow](http://stackoverflow.com)!
- R documentation can be confusing… but also very helpful—particularly vignettes or GitHub README files.

Management

- Set directory
- Loading files
